name: Frederick Snare Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia

judges: Before Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Frederick Snare Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Gordon.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frederic L. Ballard, of Ballard, Spahr, Andrews <& Ingersoll, with him Robert Brigham, for appellant.
A. Evans Kephart, with him Ernest Lowengrund, Assistant City Solicitors, and Joseph Bharfsin, City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Frederick Snare Corporation, Appellant, v. Philadelphia.
Argued January 20, 1937.
Before Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Frederic L. Ballard, of Ballard, Spahr, Andrews <& Ingersoll, with him Robert Brigham, for appellant.
A. Evans Kephart, with him Ernest Lowengrund, Assistant City Solicitors, and Joseph Bharfsin, City Solicitor, for appellee.
March 22, 1937:
